@piratetheworld12 
You need to click on the patches to crack the apps of the CS6 suite so this is an automated crack.

You need to enter your password to patch hosts files because hosts files are admin password protected, when you patch hosts files (the patch is automated), it protect your crack from adobe protections. 

When you update CS6 with adobe updater, you need to recrack the CS6 suite.

You can use internet when you use CS6.

This patch work for the extended version of photoshop (for more informations of photoshop extended, visit : http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshopextended.html).
